CustomField.description: Days of the week the duty applies
CustomField.formula: IF(Route_Template__r.Monday__c,"Mon ","")+ IF(Route_Template__r.Tuesday__c,"Tue ","") + IF(Route_Template__r.Wednesday__c,"Wed ","") + IF(Route_Template__r.Thursday__c,"Thu ","") + IF(Route_Template__r.Friday__c,"Fri ","") + IF(Route_Template__r.Saturday__c,"Sat ","") + IF(Route_Template__r.Sunday__c,"Sun ","")
CustomField.label: Active Duty Days
